Document.Name: Tender Withdrawal Reception Notification, root element

Element.Name: UBL Verison identifier
Element.Description: Requires UBL version 2.3

Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. It enables the buyer to process the document in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: Tender withdrawal reception notification identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the Tender Withdrawal Reception Notification as issued by the economic operator. Must be expressed as a UUID.

Element.Name: Reference number
Element.Description: An identifier that is specified by the buyer and used as a reference number for all documents in the procurement process. It is also known as procurement project identifier, procurement reference number or contract folder identifier.

Element.Name: Document issue date
Element.Description: Date when the tender withdrawal reception notification was issued.

Element.Name: Document issue time
Element.Description: Time when the tender withdrawal reception notification was issued.

Element.Name: Document reception date
Element.Description: Date when the tender withdrawal was received by the sender of the tender withdrawal reception notification.

Element.Name: Document reception time
Element.Description: The time at which the tender withdrawal was received by the sender of the tender withdrawal reception notification.

Element.Name: Received document reference
Element.Description: The tender reception notification contains the reference to the tender document sent by the economic operator. The contracting authority should refer to the tender by using the document hash and the hash algorithm method used.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: Identifier of a document

Element.Name: Document type code
Element.Description: Document Type Code is coded according to code list 1001 issued by UN/CEFACT.

Element.Name: Attachment
Element.Description: Container for document digest

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: Container for document digest

Element.Name: Document digest
Element.Description: Document digest of a tender document. Used as a reference to the tender document to be withdrawn.

Element.Name: Document digest methode mode
Element.Description: Code that indicates the algorithm used to calculate the hash. For the tender digest document hash algorithm must be "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#sha256".

Element.Name: Issuing system identification
Element.Description: Identification of the system that issues the document.

Element.Name: Contracting body
Element.Description: The contracting body is the contracting authority or contracting entity who is buying supplies, services or tendering works.

Element.Name: Party identification
Element.Description: An identifier for this party.

Element.Name: Contracting body identifier
Element.Description: The national identifier of a contracting body as it is legally registered (e.g. VAT identification, such as KBO)

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: A name for this party.

Element.Name: Contracting body name
Element.Description: The name of the contracting body as it is registered.

Element.Name: Economic operator
Element.Description: Any natural or legal person or public entity or group of such persons and/or entities, including any temporary association of undertakings, which offers the execution of works and/or a work, the supply of products or the provision of services on the market.

Element.Name: Party Identification
Element.Description: An identifier for this party.

Element.Name: Contracting body identifier
Element.Description: The national identifier of a contracting body as it is legally registered (e.g. VAT identification, such as KBO)

Element.Name: Party name
Element.Description: A name for this party.

Element.Name: Contracting body name
Element.Description: The name of the contracting body as it is registered.
